src:
Man City Harap-Harap Cemas, Ederson Absen Lawan Liverpool?
07 Nov 2019, 06:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Manchester City berharap-harap cemas menunggu kabar kondisi cedera Ederson menjelang duel panas kontra Liverpool di Premier League akhir pekan ini. Sang kiper ditarik keluar di paruh waktu pada laga imbang 1-1 kontra Atalanta di Liga Champions, Kamis (7/11/2019) dini hari WIB.
Kiper Brasil ini sebenarnya tidak bekerja terlalu keras. Tidak ada tembakan lawan yang tepat sasaran sampai Man City unggul 1-0 lewat gol Raheem Sterling, sebelum Gabriel Jesus gagal mengeksekusi penalti.
Ederson keluar dari kotak penalti menjelang akhir babak pertama, tapi tampak tidak ada masalah pada kondisinya. Sebab itu, melihat Claudio Bravo menjalani pemanasan untuk bermain babak kedua cukup mengejutkan.
Apa yang sebenarnya terjadi? Mengutip Goal internasional, baca selengkapnya di bawah ini ya, Bolaneters!
text:
Man City Anxiously, Ederson Absent Against Liverpool?
Nov 7 2019, 06:00 by Bola.net
Soccer - Manchester City are anxiously awaiting news of Ederson's injury condition ahead of a hot duel against Liverpool in the Premier League this weekend. The goalkeeper was pulled out at half-time in the 1-1 draw against Atalanta in the Champions League on Thursday (11/07/2019) early morning hrs.
The Brazilian goalkeeper is actually not working too hard. There were no shots on target until Man City won 1-0 through Raheem Sterling's goal, before Gabriel Jesus failed to execute a penalty.
Ederson came out of the penalty box towards the end of the first half, but it seemed there was no problem in his condition. Therefore, seeing Claudio Bravo undergoing warm-up to play the second half is quite surprising.
What really happened? Citing international Goal, read below, yeah, Bolaneters!
